attributes.action: Remove the £120 annual fee nurses have to pay to the NMC to keep their pin no.
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS and all nurses have always been overworked and underpaid for the jobs they do. 
Especially over the last year or so and the government say the nhs has been amazing throughout covid so stop charging the nurses for the amazing jobs they do.
attributes.background:
Stop charging nurses to be able to carry on working. 
1. Shouldn’t happen in the first place 
2. Government keep going on about how thankful of the nhs they are so back that up
3. Nurses shouldn’t have to loose their pin/job to care for people because they don’t pay the fee

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555025

The professional fees for nurses are set by the professional bodies for nurses, not the Government or House of Commons, but the above petition calls on the Government to reimburse nurses for the cost of these fees.
